author: wn.com
title: HUD Awards Over $1.8 Million to Fight Housing Discrimination in Texas (Texas/US Department of Housing ...
text: ( Source : Texas /US Department of Housing and Urban Development ) WASHINGTON - The U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development ( HUD ) announced today that it is awarding more than $38 million under HUD's Fair Housing Initiatives Program
